description: Submission of details pursuant to Condition 49.1 (Early Works) of planning permission F/04687/13 dated 23/07/2014 for the comprehensive redevelopment of Brent Cross Cricklewood.Works to the Tertiary Street to the west of Plot 15 include: installation of drainage, potable water, LV/HV cabling, District Heating, Comms and temporary asphalt. Works to the Junction between the High Street South and the Interim Transport Interchange include: installation of drainage, potable water, LV/HV cabling, District Heating and Cooling, Comms, asphalt, kerb and white lining excluding loading bays to provide temporary haul routes
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
site_name: Brent Cross Cricklewood Regeneration Area, North West London: Junction Between High Street South And The Interim Transport Interchange; And Tertiary Street To The West Of Plot 19
